description: Generalized nim sum n + n in base 5.
comments: I.e. double (mod 5) each digit (0->0, 1->2, 2->4, 3->1, 4->3) of the base-5 representation of n)
links: Index entries for sequences related to Nim-sums
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: Generalized nim sum m + n in base q: write m and n in base q and add mod q with no carries, e.g. 5 + 8 in base 3 = "21" + "22" = "10" = 1.
crossrefs: Inverse permutation: A065256. A004515[n] = A065257[n+1]-1 ("Quintal Queens" permutation)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
